p: The cost of EH-associated mortality across the State of Michigan was $280 million in the projected period and $42 million in the historical period, based on a value per life-year of $129,000. The projected cost of EH-associated morbidity was dominated by EH-associated ED visits, estimated at $14 million, or $12 million higher than the historical cost (Table 4). EP costs were similar in the historical and projected periods: $390,000 and $480,000, respectively.
